data.message: i love you marshall your my whole world you help me through every waking minute and thanks to you i can be myself. I can be happy. I know you do hear and see this everyday..your probably annoyed by it but im your biggest fan. Im just so grateful you could live your dream and inspire others to do the same. I know im just another fan in another comment but i just want to tell you or anyone who reads this i just have to get it out because no one understands. No one but you <3 thank you Em from the bottom of my heart. To the moon and back on my Space Bound rocketship <3
